import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {FilePerson, House} from 'react-bootstrap-icons' function NavBar() { const[hide, setHide] = useState() useEffect(() => { if(window.screen.availWidth < 768){ setHide(false) } else{ setHide(true) } }) console.log(window.screen.availWidth) return (
  • Home
  • About us
    • Gallery
  • Events
  • Support Us
  • Features
  • Blog
  • Contact Us
) } export default NavBar
